SC_DESCRIPTION: Submits an image for a character `Version` variant
CARD_DIMENSION: <:_:979009081325019156> The dimensions of the submitted image must be **297** x **465** (Width x Height)
OFFICIAL_ART_ALLOWED: <:_:979009081325019156> The submitted artwork **must** be official art.
USE_DISCORD_LINK: <:_:979009081325019156> Make sure that the submitted image is hosted on the discord servers `cdn.discordapp.com` or `media.discordapp.net`
LINK_TO_SOURCE: <:_:979009081325019156> Provide the link to the source of the image
IMAGES_REJECTED: <:_:979009081325019156> Artwork being used for `GIF`, `3D` or `Event` cards will be rejected
NO_PINGING_STAFF: ⚠️ Do not ping any staff in an attempt to speed up the review of your submission!
CARD_ID_INVALID: {{author}} The Card-ID you submitted is invalid
NOT_ALLOWED_EVENT_SUBMIT: > {{author}} You are not allowed to submit event images
SURE_DISCORD_LINK: > {{author}}, make sure the url you use is a discord url
VALID_IMAGE_URL: > {{author}}, make sure the image url is a png/jpg
VALID_CARD_DIMENSIONS: > {{author}} the card image dimension must be **`297x465`
VALID_EVENT_2D_DIMENSIONS: > {{author}} the 2d event card image dimension must be `297x465`
VALID_EVENT_3D_DIMENSIONS: > {{author}} the 3d event card image dimension must be `402x603`
SUBMIT_CONFIRMATION: Do you want to submit the {{isEventSubmission}}
SUBMISSION_DENY: You need 1 silvers to make a card submission
